      • loadRotors

        public void loadRotors(Reflector.Reflectors ReflectorChoice,
              Rotor.Rotors[] RotorTable,
              Characters[] ringOffsetTable)
        TODO currently does not check for multiple insertions of the same rotor.
        Parameters:
        ReflectorChoice - "WideB" or "WideC"
        RotorTable - A 3 item array of Rotors found in Rotors.getValues().
        ringOffsetTable - A 3 item array of Characters.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - On normal parsing errors.

      • SetSteckerBoard

        public void SetSteckerBoard(java.lang.String SteckerBoardPairs)
        Parameters:
        SteckerBoardPairs - 10 pairs of alphabetic characters separated by :

      • setIndicators

        public void setIndicators(Characters[] newIndicators)
        Used for reseting the rotor indicators. Usually when switching between the random starting position and the message key.
        Parameters:
        newIndicators -

      • machineDescription

        public static java.util.Properties machineDescription(java.util.Properties inProp)
        Included to support some auto adjustment of the front ends to the various Enigma machines. Not well implemented right now. Data format may change in the future.
        Parameters:
        inProp - Null if these properties are to be separate from other Properties.
        Returns:
        machineType.
        numberOfRotors
        The number of simultaneously usable Rotors.
        validRotors
        A space delimited string of valid Rotor Names
        numberOfReflectors
        The number of simultaneously usable Reflectors.
        validReflectors
        A space delimited string of valid Reflector Names
